item.title: Managing music using mpd/mpc
item.description: Music Player Daemon (MPD) is a lightweight application. It hardly takes any cpu. Moreover it runs in background and does not clutter and workspace. If you dont use mouse frequently or wants to avoid it (programmers use keyboard), then mpd is for you. It is one of those applications which does one job at a time and does it really well (well, if you get is working once which is not very hard).
